metadata.title: CVE-2024-26920 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tracing/trigger: Fix to return error if failed to alloc snapshotFix register_snapshot_trigger() to return error code if it failed toallocate a snapshot instead of 0 (success). Unless that, it will registersnapshot trigger without an error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
